sentences.sContent: More anglers are taking cameras when they go fishing to provide a memento of catches.
sentences.sCn: 更多的垂钓者去钓鱼时带上照相机，以便钓上鱼后留个纪念。

synos.tran: 纪念品，引起回忆的东西

words.tran: 显著的，难忘的；值得纪念的
纪念碑，纪念馆；纪念仪式；纪念物

trans.tranCn: 纪念品，引起回忆的东西
trans.tranOther: a small thing that you keep to remind you of someone or something
